attributes.action: close schools, colleges and universities due to the increase of covid transport
attributes.additional_details:
To help resolve cases and to control the virus. As we have been in lockdown for 3+days the cases are continuing to rise as schools are yet to close. 
Schools are rated the 1st transportation of viruses and if children take it home and spread it to family's it would affect older carers or parents. This is because not all children show symptoms and most are carriers. Help save the Uk and the family who are losing loved ones and close schools!
attributes.background: I and thousands would like the government to close educational institutions. This is because of the uprise in COVID-19 cases and death.Teachers in schools are outraged that schools is not going to close as deaths and transportation increases. If schools stay open the UK will be in a bigger problem.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close all Schools and colleges and Universities during second lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557413

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012

Force Universities to close commencing National Lockdown on November 5th 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558383

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
